description:

description:
A special move that deals light attribute damage to all enemies. Its
power is reduced for non-virgins. (There are rumors of a Sister who
can restore virginity with hymenoplasty magic.)
name: Lost Virgin Slash

<End Timed Attack>
<特定状態スキル>
<発生コモンイベントＩＤ:6,7>

stage.

description:
Slash a single enemy three times with a physical attack. Each attack
has 0.8 times the power of a normal attack.
name: Triple Slash

description: Deliver a powerful blow to a single enemy with a physical attack.
name: Straight Punch

description:
Deliver a heavy blow to a single enemy with a physical attack. Medium
chance of inflicting <Confusion>.
name: Face Punch

description: Attack a single enemy twice in succession with a physical attack.
name: Rapid Thrusts

description:
Deliver a devastating blow to a single enemy with a physical attack,
more than doubling the power. The attack occurs on the next turn and
cannot target specific enemies.
name: All-Out Strike

description: Deal earth attribute damage.
name: Stone

description: Deal wind attribute damage to a single enemy with a magical attack.
name: Wind

description: High chance of poisoning all enemies.
name: Poison Smog

description: High chance of putting all enemies to sleep.
name: Sleep Shower

description:
[All Enemies] Summon the fire demon Ifrit to deal fire attribute
damage.
name: Ifrit

description: Summon the Ice Queen Shiva to deal ice attribute damage to all enemies
name: Shiva

description:
Summon the Thunder Beast Fenrir to deal thunder attribute damage to
all enemies
name: Fenrir

description:
Summon the Water Holy Beast Kelpie to deal water attribute damage to
all enemies
name: Kelpie

description:
Summon the Earth Giant Titan to deal earth attribute damage to all
enemies
name: Titan

description: Neither attack nor defend, and watch the enemy's movements
name: Observe

description: Slash at a single enemy twice [Physical Attack]
name: Sequential Slash

description:
Slash at a single enemy three times [Physical Attack] Each attack has
0.8 times the power of a normal attack
name: Triple Slash

description: Slash in the shape of a victorious 'V'
name: Victory Rush

description: Attack all enemies at once with a magic attack [Magic Attack]
name: Blast Wave

description:
Deal a critical blow to a single enemy with more than double the power
[Physical Attack] The attack will take place on the next turn, and
cannot target a specific enemy
name: All-Out Strike

description: Increase the attack power of all allies by 20% for several turns
name: Weapon Raise

description: Increase the defense power of all allies by 20% for several turns
name: Defense Raise

description: Deal light attribute damage to all enemies [Magic Attack]
name: Shining Shot

description:
Deal dark attribute damage to all enemies [Magic Attack] Medium chance
to inflict <Blindness>
name: Dark Hole

description: A skill that can win with a single strike
name: Finishing Move
